sentence.Network_en: The country appears to be violating several articles of the convention.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个国家看起来违反了公约中的好几项条款。

sentence.Network_en: These men were violating her family's privacy.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些人侵犯了她的家庭隐私。

sentence.Network_en: Ignorance of a law does not excuse a man for violating it.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个人不懂法律不构成犯法的理由.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Officials had accused them of violating health regulations ., 官员们指责他们的设备不符合卫生条例.
B is found behaviours violating laws such as theft , gambling , whoring etc., 乙方被发现有偷盗 , 赌博 , 嫖娼等到违法违纪行为的;
violating the rules and regulations will result of points , rights to post or status of being member of the forum , kindly co-operate , thank you .违反版规将影响其论坛积分、发言权利或会员权利，盼请会员遵守配合，谢谢。
they argued her out of violating the operating rules ., 他们说服她别违反操作规程.

list.abs: 戾字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 至,到达〖 cometo〗 违背,违反〖 violate〗 通“捩”。扭转〖 reverse;turnback;turnround〗.
字典中冒字的解释 ... (9) 假冒[ pretend to be] (11) 侵犯;违犯[ encroach on;violate] (14) 通“媢”。嫉妬[ envy].
专四专八考研词汇辨析大总结_clark_新浪博客 ... unified adj 统一的,一元化的 violation n 违反,违背,强奸 colleague n. 同事.
足球机_百度百科 ... - Foul 犯规 - Violation 违例（violation） - Official Time-Out 官方暂停.

entry.tran: 违反，违背，违犯（协议、法律或承诺）
entry.def: If someone violates an agreement, law, or promise, they break it.

example.ex: They went to prison because they violated the law...
example.tran: 他们触犯了法律，因此坐了牢。

entry.def: If you violate someone's privacy or peace, you disturb it.

example.ex: These men were violating her family's privacy.
example.tran: 这些人侵犯了她的家庭隐私。

entry.def: If someone violates a special place, for example a grave, they damage it or treat it with disrespect.

example.ex: Detectives are still searching for those who violated the graveyard.
example.tran: 侦探们仍在搜捕那些亵渎了墓园的家伙。
